name: EnLightened
description:
Enlightened is 3d game with 2d characters. It is survival horror where you decide what is your goal. Do you want to escape? Or to know what happened?

Currently game is still in development phase. Available version is first look demo of gameplay (few minutes). The full release of the game is planned in next year. The idea at the game came when we were planning a game for pixel horror jam. There is still a lot of work left.

Gameplay

Game is focused on exploring hotel, putting all pieces of what happened together, solving puzzles and keeping yourself alive from threat. There will be a few possible endings in game depending if you would like to run away as early as you can or you would you want to visit all the places. What happened here? Why are you here? Why your head hurts? Where is everyone?

Will you able to find answers to all this questions?
